participant_1.background:
I have had a history of anxiety and depression, but I am managing it well with therapy and medication.
I eat a slice of my favorite pizza to cheer up.
i like to do my nails.

participant_2.background:
My parents are not supportive of my singing because they want me to have a stable career.
i like to skateboard.
i sing in the school chorus.
i love disney movies.
i am a high school student.

content.text: Doing well thank you! How are you doing this evening?
I'm good thanks! I'm just chilling at home, you?
Nice! I'm about to go skate, it's a beautiful day out!
That sounds fun! I wish I could skate, I'm not very coordinated lol
It's never too late to learn! I took lessons when I was younger and it was so much fun.
I know, I've been thinking about it! I love disney movies, what are your favorites?
I love all of them, but my favorite is Mulan!
Mulan is so good! I love the songs in that movie.
Me too! I also love to sing, but my parents aren't very supportive of it.
That's too bad, you should keep singing! It's a great way to express yourself.
I know, I'm going to keep doing it anyway! I love it too much to give it up.
That's great! I'm sure you're really good at it.
